name: Lennar Corporation
summary: Lennar Corporation is one of the largest home construction companies in the United States, headquartered in Miami, Florida. Founded in 1954, Lennar operates in 26 states and 75 markets, building single-family and multifamily homes, and offering mortgage and financial services. The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange and consistently ranks among the top homebuilders by revenue and market presence.
